Mitchell’s third-quarter 3-point barrage keyed the decisive run. He opened the period by sinking treys on three straight Cleveland possessions for a 9-0 spurt. The quick burst was part of a pivotal 20-5 run that lasted the first four minutes of the period and was capped when Mitchell connected on his fourth 3-pointer of the stretch.

On the other end, the Cavaliers’ defense made it difficult for Golden State to score from outside or the interior. The Warriors shot just 33 of 99 from the floor, including 9 of 38 (23.7 percent) on 3-point attempts.

He hit six three pointers and tallied twenty points.

Porter Jr. was in his bag tonight.

Kawhi Leonard made his season debut against the Atlanta Hawks after missing the first 34 games of the 2024-25 season.
The Clippers bolted to a 20-point halftime lead and secured a much-needed victory after losing their last two games.
Kawhi Leonard scored his first bucket of the season by drilling a three-pointer against Hawks rookie Zaccharie Risacher.
Norman Powell scored 20 points.
Kawhi Leonard added 12 points in his first game of the season.
Ivica Zubac had 18 points and 18 rebounds.
Amir Coffey had 17 points.
Trae Young led Atlanta with 20 points and 14 assists.
The Clippers had a 27-4 run in the second quarter.
Leonard hit a 3-pointer on his first shot from the left wing with 9:57 remaining in the first quarter.
Coach Tyronn Lue confirmed that the team will be intentional with Leonard's playing time, treating it like his preseason and training camp.
Leonard became a full-contact participant for Clippers’ practices starting Dec. 18, fueling speculation about his return.
Kawhi Leonard expressed that playing for the first time in 253 days was the 'easy part' and emphasized the difficulty of not playing and having to rehab.
Coach Ty Lue mentioned that Leonard's presence on the floor makes it easier for everybody else and highlighted the importance of Leonard continuing to build off his performance.
Leonard expressed confidence in his return but acknowledged his ongoing day-to-day status due to right knee soreness.
Coach Tyronn Lue emphasized taking it slow with Leonard's playing time.
Kawhi Leonard expressed his excitement about returning, stating 'It felt great. Was able to throw some paint on the canvas tonight. We're working to create something beautiful so let's keep going.'
Leonard also praised his teammates, mentioning their strong performance in his absence and highlighting players like James, Zu, and Norm.
Kawhi Leonard ended his night with 12 points on 4-11 shooting in just 19 minutes as the Clippers eased him back into action.
With much of the 2024-25 season still left to play, Leonard has plenty of time to make a difference and raise the ceiling for the LA squad.
Kawhi Leonard received a warm reception in his first game at the Clippers' $2-billion Intuit Dome.
Leonard played just 3:36 in the second half due to a minutes restriction.
The entire league was excited to see Kawhi Leonard in action again, with many top NBA pages reposting his first basket of the season to welcome him back.
Hawks: Guard Jalen Johnson did not play due to right shoulder soreness. Guard Bogdan Bogdanovic also did not play due to injury management.
Clippers: Terance Mann also returned to the lineup and scored 12 points in 16 minutes. Mann missed 10 games due to a broken middle finger on his left hand.
